question:
Greek Name: Zeus
Role: King of the Gods

Greek Name: Hera
Role: Goddess of Marriage

Greek Name: Poseidon
Role: God of the Sea

Greek Name: Cronus
Role: Youngest Son of Uranus, Father of Zeus

Greek Name: Aphrodite
Role: Goddess of Love

Greek Name: Hades
Role: God of the Underworld

Greek Name: Hephaestus
Role: God of the Forge

Greek Name: Demeter
Role: Goddess of the Harvest

Greek Name: Apollo
Role: God of Music and Medicine

Greek Name: Athena
Role: Goddess of Wisdom

Greek Name: Artemis
Role: Goddess of the Hunt

Greek Name: Ares
Role: God of War

Greek Name: Hermes
Role: Messenger of the Gods

Greek Name: Dionysus
Role: God of Wine

Greek Name: Persephone
Role: Goddess of the Underworld

Greek Name: Eros
Role: God of Love

Greek Name: Gaia
Role: Goddess of Earth

Greek Name: Hypnos
Role: God of Sleep

Greek Name: Rhea
Role: Mother of Zeus / Wife of Cronus

Greek Name: Uranus
Role: Father of the Titans

Greek Name: Nike
Role: Goddess of Victory

Greek Name: Eos
Role: Goddess of the Dawn

Greek Name: Pan
Role: God of Shepherds

Greek Name: Selene
Role: Goddess of the Moon

Greek Name: Helios
Role: God of the Sun

Greek Name: Heracles
Role: Son of Zeus

Greek Name: Odysseus
Role: Greek Hero
